TopicTitle: Im looking for a mod that gives more information about orbit paths

Articles.Content:
I'd like to know the altitude of a point as I hover over an orbit.

I'd like to know the velocity components upon exiting the SOI.

 

Is there a mod that does either of those?
MechJeb has a custom window that can be setup with many parameters. I'd be surprised if velocity isn't somewhere in there - now it may not be broken down into the reference frame your after.
there is one that does what he says - you hover mouse over an orbit and it pops up information - just can't remember what it is called.
